New Repo /maps - Free Full-Screen Interactive Beer Maps w/ Brewery Listings

Nov 11, 2014

Added a new repo, that is, /maps for hosting ‘full-screen’ interactive beer maps with brewery listings.

See an example beer map for Austria (~200 breweries n brewpubs) live or check the source using the mapbox.js mapping library.
